Create a Hello RCP application via the PDE tooling.

Add:

	public void eventLoopException(Throwable exception) {
		exception.printStackTrace();
		super.eventLoopException(exception);
	}

to ApplicationWorkbenchAdvisor.

	protected void makeActions(IWorkbenchWindow window) {
		register(ActionFactory.PREFERENCES.create(window));
	}

	protected void fillMenuBar(IMenuManager menuBar) {
		menuBar.add(getAction(ActionFactory.PREFERENCES.getId()));
	}

to ApplicationActionBarAdvisor.

Now launch the app with "Choose plug-ins and...", select the plug-in, "Add
Required Plug-ins" ... "Run".

The app window will open.

Hover with mouse over the "Preferences..." menu item.

Press F1 key.

Observe the NPE.
Fixed but using a different strategy to avoid null.
